title: Marinated Ibérico pork fillet with sautéed potatoes and pimentón
description: This easy and delicious pork dish brings the authentic flavours of inland Spain to your kitchen table.
ingredients: 1 tsp bittersweet smoked paprika, plus extra to serve
2 sprigs fresh oregano, leaves only, chopped
1kg/2lb 4oz waxy potatoes, such as Desirée potatoes, peeled, cut into 7-8mm-thick slices
2 tbsp olive oil, plus extra to serve
4 sprigs fresh thyme, leaves only, to serve
salt and freshly ground black pepper
